overview_of_class:
COURSE DESCRIPTION / Engineering elements of water supply and pollution abatement. Water quality standards, water and wastewater treatment processes and the management of receiving waters to control pollution.

COURSE OBJECTIVES / The course is designed to introduce juniors and seniors in civil or environmental engineering to theory of water and wastewater treatment processes and their design. Municipal and industrial applications and behavior of pollutants in the environment complement the major goal.
name: Environmental Engineering Applications 2: Water
subject: CIV_ENV
